seed_papers.title: Escalation Risks in LLM-Powered Wargaming: A First Assessment
seed_papers.abstract: This paper presents findings from a wargaming exercise exploring nuclear escalation risks when large language models participate in crisis simulations.
seed_papers.why_seed: Foundational paper examining LLM behavior in high-stakes wargaming scenarios with focus on escalation dynamics

seed_papers.title: Playing Diplomacy with Large Language Models
seed_papers.abstract: We present Cicero, an AI agent that can play Diplomacy at a human level by combining strategic reasoning with natural language processing.
seed_papers.why_seed: Demonstrates sophisticated LLM integration in strategic game playing with negotiation components

seed_papers.title: War Games: The Use of LLMs in Military Simulations and Training
seed_papers.abstract: Analysis of how militaries are beginning to incorporate large language models into wargaming exercises and the implications for strategic stability.
seed_papers.why_seed: Policy-oriented analysis of real-world military applications of LLMs in wargaming

seed_papers.title: GPT-4 as Red Team: Adversarial AI in Cybersecurity Wargames
seed_papers.abstract: We explore the use of GPT-4 as an adversarial red team agent in cybersecurity wargaming exercises, demonstrating both capabilities and limitations.
seed_papers.why_seed: Example of LLMs in adversarial role within specialized wargaming domain

seed_papers.title: Bias and Hallucination in AI Military Advisors: Evidence from Wargaming
seed_papers.abstract: Systematic analysis of bias patterns and hallucination tendencies when LLMs serve as military advisors in strategic wargaming scenarios.
seed_papers.why_seed: Critical examination of failure modes specific to military/strategic contexts
